data.comment: Watford kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Coventry have kicked-off the second half at Vicarage Road.
Goal! Andre Gray gives Watford a 1-0 lead.
Leo Ostigard (Coventry) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Watford's Kiko Femenia has been booked in Watford.
Gustavo Hamer grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Vicarage Road.
Goal! Coventry have got their heads in front thanks to a Tyler Walker strike.
In the minute 66, Goal! William Troost-Ekong (Watford) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Watford.
The home team replace Kiko Femenia with Jeremy Ngakia.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a second substitution, with Troy Deeney replacing Andre Gray.
Watford have been awarded a penalty in Watford...
In the minute 83, Callum O`Hare (Coventry) gets a yellow card.
Ismaila Sarr converts the penalty to give Watford a 3-2 lead.
In the minute 87, Watford make their third substitution with Nathaniel Chalobah replacing James Garner.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-2.
Julien Da Costa is replacing Sam McCallum for the away team.
Jamie Allen is replacing Gustavo Hamer for Coventry at Vicarage Road.
